events.message: We have received the application of John Doe for the software engineer position in our development team.
The application has been categorised under Engineering based on the keywords like software and engineer found in the resume.
Recruiter Alice Smith was assigned to John Doe's software engineer application to proceed with further screening.
Initial screening completed successfully; candidate demonstrated strong knowledge of software development practices.
John Doe responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm for the software engineer role and the upcoming interview process.
Technical interview has been scheduled for John Doe on May 5th to assess his software engineering and problem-solving skills.
John Doe completed the technical interview and performed exceptionally well, showing deep expertise in software development.
HR interview was scheduled for John Doe to discuss cultural fit and employment terms for the software engineer position.
HR interview completed successfully; candidate appears to be a great fit for our company culture and role.
A job offer was proposed to John Doe for the software engineer role, including competitive salary and benefits.
John Doe provided positive feedback on the job offer and expressed strong interest in joining the engineering team.
John Doe accepted the job offer enthusiastically and is excited to start as a software engineer with our company.
Onboarding process has started for John Doe to integrate him smoothly into the engineering team.
Hiring process is officially closed with John Doe joining the company as a software engineer.
